name: Little Legion
description:
Fight your way through 50 waves of enemies, 5 bosses, and accumulate your drone army!

You should probably read through the in-game tutorial, by clicking the question mark button at the top-left of the main menu.

The skip menu at the bottom right of the main menu allows you to choose your starting wave; The game is most fun if you play it from round 1, and experience it in the order it was meant to be played. However, if you are stuck, and want to see all the content the game has to offer, you can either use the skip as checkpoints, or to skip a boss you just can't beat.
